attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am only 15. I feel that the quota system used in education to allow students in who are not of the schools faith is wrong.

I believe the current system is wrong as it punishes people who have lots to offer and deserve to be in be giving the best chance to succed in education, also the system is just totally unfair lets judge on abilty not colour or faith. I hope you agree, I am writing this because quotas are wrong and I believe this is how most people feel.
